title: Boards Profile Is Not Updating
body:
I changed my in game name a while ago and the boards profile is not changing, the level that is listed is also incorrect. I was just wondering if this is a bug, or if its not supposed to change with the in game name. Maybe you could force update it or something. Thanks in advance.

Edit: It updated as I posted this....

replies.body: Looks you learned how to do a boards sync today fam ^_^. Post here in H&S or simply using the Syncing Tool stickied up top will push a profile sync through and update both your level and icon.
